LocaleResource.Name: DescriptionText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter info that will be shown to customers during checkout.

LocaleResource.Name: AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: GTPaySettingRetrievalFailedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay settings could not be retrieved!

LocaleResource.Name: GTPaySettingUpdateSuccessfulMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay setting update operation was successful

LocaleResource.Name: GTPayTransactionLogUpdateFailedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Transaction Log update operation failed!

LocaleResource.Name: GTPayTransactionLogUpdateSuccessfulMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Transaction Log update operation was successful

LocaleResource.Name: GTPayCurrencyUpdateSuccessfulMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Supported Currency update operation was successful

LocaleResource.Name: GTPayCurrenyFailedOnLoadMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Supported curreny failed on load! Click the back button and try again.

LocaleResource.Name: NoteTransactionReferenceNumberMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Please note the below Transaction Reference Number, because you will need it to track your payment.

LocaleResource.Name: EmailHasBeenSentMessage
LocaleResource.Value: An email has been sent to your registered email ({0}). You can print or download your invoice by clicking the above 'Print' or 'Order as PDF' button respectively. To do a re-order, click the 'Re-order' button below or click {1} here{2} to go back to home page

LocaleResource.Name: PaymentRequestSessionClearedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Payment Request session was accidentally cleared! Please contact your system administrator

LocaleResource.Name: EmptyGatewayResponseMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Gateway response is empty! Please click on the 'Continue button' below to initiate another transaction.

LocaleResource.Name: OrderOrCustomerCannotBeRetreivedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Order or Customer cannot be retrieved!

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayTransactionAmountModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Transaction Amount was modified from {0} to {1} in transit

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayMerchantIDModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Merchant ID was modified in transit

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayResponseCodeModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Response Code was modified in transit

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayResponseDescriptionModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Response Description was modified in transit

LocaleResource.Name: ReportIssueToSystemAdminstratorMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Kindly report this issue to your system adminstrator immediately

LocaleResource.Name: ManInTheMiddleAttackOccurredMessage
LocaleResource.Value: The following 'Man In The Middle Attack' occurred during the transction processing!

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayTransactionCurrencyModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Transaction Currency was modified in transit from '{0}' to '{1}'

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayCustomerIDModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Customer ID was modified in transit from {0} to {1}

LocaleResource.Name: Attacked.GTPayRedirectURLModifiedMessage
LocaleResource.Value: GTPay Redirect URL was modified from in transit from '{0}' to '{1}'

LocaleResource.Name: ErrorOccuredMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Error occurred during request processing! Plesae try again

LocaleResource.Name: ErrorDetailMessage
LocaleResource.Value: {0} See below for{1} error details. Click the 'Continue shopping' button below to continue shopping, or click {2} here{3} to go back to home page.

LocaleResource.Name: ManInTheMiddleAttackMessage
LocaleResource.Value: One or more transaction parameters have been modified in transit! The system has aborted this transaction to save you from malicious attack. Please click the 'Continue shopping' button below to initiate another transaction, or click {0} here{1} to go to the home page. Sorry for the inconveniences this might have caused you.

LocaleResource.Name: NameAndEmailExist
LocaleResource.Value: {0} ({1}) ordered {2} that cost {3} with order ID of {4}

LocaleResource.Name: NameAndEmailDoesNotExist
LocaleResource.Value: Customer with ID of '{0}' ordered {1} that cost {2} with order ID of {3}

LocaleResource.Name: SupportedCurrencyNullArgument
LocaleResource.Value: supportedCurrency retrieval failed! Please try again

LocaleResource.Name: GTPaySettingsNullArgument
LocaleResource.Value: GTPaySettings could not be retrieved! Please try again, but contact your system administrator after three unsuccessful trials

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.ReferenceNo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is a merchant-wide unique identifier of each transaction request sent to GTPay by merchant. The transaction reference no. must be unique per transaction.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.TransactMode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the payment status after order completion.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.HashKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is a sha512 hash of the following parameters: gtpay_mert_id, gtpay_tranx_id, gtpay_tranx_amt, gtpay_tranx_curr, gtpay_cust_id, gtpay_tranx_noti_url

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.MerchantID.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the GTPay-wide unique identifier of merchant, assigned by GTPay and communicated to merchant by GTBank.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.GatewayPostUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the URL that accepts all transaction requests.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.GatewayRequeryUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This URL is used to confirm the status of specific transaction at the gateway.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.ShowGatewayInterface.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If selected, then merchant site redirects straight to the gateway without passing through GTPay interface

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.ShowGatewayNameFirst.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If selected, GTPay should take customer directly from merchant's page to the gateway to effect the debit/credit. If not specified, customer will be shown GTPay's own first page, from where he/she will continue to the gateway
